mapper.select: select TMU.*, TSC.ACCOUNTBALANCE as SILVER_COIN, TGC.ACCOUNTBALANCE as GOLDEN_COIN from TB_M_USER as TMU left outer join ( TB_SILVER_COIN as TSC, TB_GOLDEN_COIN as TGC ) on ( TMU.SILVER_COIN_ID = TSC.SILVER_COIN_ID and TMU.GOLDEN_COIN_ID = TGC.GOLDEN_COIN_ID) where EMAIL=#{email} and PASSWORD=#{password};
